trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The mephit explodes when it dies. {@actSave dex} {@dc 11}, each creature in a 5-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the mephit. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) Slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 11}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.
